title: Changing the Default Sending Email Address
content:
How do I change the Default SENDING email address to a different one? I have 4 email addresses and it only 'sends' from the current default address. I want to choose the (DEFAULT) address that the Receiver see's and replys to.

TIA
creator: minkwa1

title: Identify mails sent with "Return Receipt" or "Delivery Status Notification" activated
content: Hi, I would like to check which of all the e-mails I have already sent were done so with either or both of the options "Return Receipt" or "Delivery Status Notification" activated. Is there a way to view this? Is the option recorded somewhere in the mail message itself?
creator: Newrone

title: Thunderbird upgrade to ver. 115.1.1 (64-bit)
content: Upgraded Thunderbird to ver. 115.1.1 (64-bit) and now will no longer save passwords. Existing email accounts will not authenticate with save password checked. Uncheck save password, enter password and everything works for the duration of the session but of course when you close and start a new session all email accounts prompt for password. Win 10 latest updates.
creator: spam_list
